name: misappropriation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of stealing something that you have been trusted to take care of and using it for yourself: He was charged with embezzlement and misappropriation of union funds. These agreements may be ineffective in preventing misappropriation of technology. See
misappropriate
More examplesFewer examplesThe firm discussed the alleged misappropriation of trade secrets on its company website.The transactions were an attempt to conceal the misappropriation of money. There were concerns about government misappropriation of private land.
